column9: SOURCE: Shreveport Times, 10/29/1901 (Tech Media Guide said 57)
Source: Shreveport Times, 11/29/1901. Missing page that has the final score.
Tech Media Guide DID NOT HAVE

Shreveport Journal Article dated 22 Oct 1904 suggests this game was actually on the 21st ("The University of Louisiana eleven yesterday afternoon defeated the Ruston Institute team by a score of 17 to 0)
Confirmed that this game was actually played on October 22, 1904 in NOLA. Times-Democrat article from 10/23/1904
LSU Media Guide has this game taking place on 10/29/1904, which makes more sense (they played at the Shreveport AC on the 28th, which is verified in the Shreveport Journal
Shreveport Times article Oct 26 (Tech media guide said 43-4)
this game was forfeited by ULL, Tech counts it as a W
first night game in Tech history
